title: The Plant
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 17 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: This book informs students about what is needed to grow a plant. Students will learn how to ask and answer questions as well as sequence events in this informative concept book. Detailed, supportive photographs and the high-frequency word the support early readers.
reviewWords: dirt, hole, plant, rain, seed, shovel, sunshine
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /s/ sound
grammar: Simple Subject                : Recognize and locate simple subjects
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use high-frequency word the
